title: BUbuisnessAndMarket

items.title: Built to last: governance for multigenerational family businesses
items.description: When starting a company, nimble decision-making and founder-led intuition are often hallmarks of success. More structure is needed with complexity.

items.title: Why AI’s greatest challenge is leadership, not innovation
items.description: CEOs reveal how AI, social media and bold leadership are shaping the future of business.
